description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Aitutaki, Cook Islands. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Cook Islands Luxury: Aitutaki Beachfront Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Three Dinners & Transfers
hotels.description: In the heart of the shimmering South Pacific lies the beautifully remote Pacific Resort Aitutaki. A short flight from Rarotonga, the serene blue-green lagoon, nodding palm trees and crystal-clear skies of this five-star escape will take your breath away. The resort is a true taste of heaven, with just 29 intimate thatched beachfront bungalows delivering unparalleled seclusion and hospitality. One of only two Cook Islands resorts included in the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this far-flung island paradise is yours to enjoy at your own pace. Whether that's taking a refreshing dip in the palm-fringed infinity pool, kayaking the length of the island, being pampered at the onsite spa or finding your spot among the palms on Aitutaki's secluded beachfront, you're sure to find your bliss in this divine corner of the world.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Cook Islands Private Paradise with Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Paradise awaits in the heart of the South Pacific with an adults-only escape to Aitutaki Lagoon Private Island Resort, a true gem of the Cook Islands. Wake each morning to panoramic views over one of the world’s most stunning lagoons, and immerse yourself in the striking beauty of this private island. Surrounded by impossibly turquoise waters, spend days unwinding on powdery white sands, snorkelling through vibrant coral gardens, or swaying in a hammock under swaying palms - all the while feeling completely cut off from the outside world. Dive deep into island charm with Polynesian-inspired beachfront bungalows, a tranquil spa and fresh local flavours. Daily complimentary activities include snorkeling and snorkeling lessons, fish feeding, island drumming and dancing, ukulele sessions, pareu (sarong) tying, palm-frond weaving, lei making, coconut husking shows, crab hunting and racing, guided island walks and more. Keep busy with complimentary use of water sports equipment including stand-up paddleboards, kayaks, a Polynesian outrigger canoe, snorkelling gear, beach towels, sunloungers and hammocks. This is paradise, exactly as you imagined it.

hotels.title: Five-Star Cook Islands Aitutaki Escape with Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Beautifully remote, this luxurious escape in the heart of the South Pacific is just as nature intended. A vision of pristine isolation, the shimmering blue-green lagoon, nodding palm trees and crystal-clear skies at the five-star Pacific Resort Aitutaki will take your breath away. This is a true taste of heaven where just 29 intimate thatched beachfront bungalows deliver unparalleled seclusion and award-winning serenity in the iconic Cook Islands. A short flight from Rarotonga, one of only two Cook Islands resorts included in the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and named among the top 25 small hotels in the South Pacific at the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2023 awards, this far-flung island resort is your piece of paradise to enjoy at your own pace. Whether that's taking a refreshing dip in the palm-fringed infinity pool, kayaking the length of the island, being pampered at the award-winning spa or finding your spot among the palms and volcanic rocks scattered on Aitutaki's secluded beachfront.

hotels.title: Secluded Aitutaki Cook Islands Beachfront Resort with Two Pools & Restaurant
hotels.description: Escape to a secluded paradise in the South Pacific, with a stay at this tropical haven on the tranquil shores of the Pacific Ocean. This tropical haven offers unrivaled access to the region’s vibrant marine life, inviting you to unwind and indulge in the beauty of island living. Savour authentic Polynesian flavours at Resort Tava’e Restaurant & Bar, where the menu is inspired by the island's rich bounty. For those seeking adventure, the resort is a gateway to untouched natural wonders, lush rainforests and hidden waterfalls. Explore the local culture with a visit to the nearby village, where traditional Polynesian crafts and dances are still practised. As the sun sets, take a refreshing dip in the resort's infinity pool, overlooking the breathtaking ocean.

hotels.title: Tropical Cook Islands Aitutaki Paradise with Spa & Restaurant
hotels.description: Wake up in South Pacific paradise at Tamanu Beach Resort, nestled on an intimate atoll in the Cook Islands. Beautifully appointed bungalows and villas offer a serene unplugged escape in a pristine tropical setting. Immerse yourself in island culture, snorkel or kayak the crystal-clear waters, or hike through the verdant foliage. In between adventures, enjoy international flavours at the onsite restaurant and bar, or find your zen in the spa.

seo.title: Hoteles en Aitutaki - Cook Islands Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Aitutaki, Cook Islands con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
